name: Neon Little Soul
description:
Neon Little Soul is a frenetic and fun action platformer game, a little gem of minimalist pixel art, retro style and arcade spirit.
Your most loved one was kidnapped. Now you come to the rescue. Climb the dangerous floors of the neon building to reach your quest.



TRAPS
Spikes, explosive tiles, electrical devices, moving walls, acid drops and many other traps await the brave.



ENEMIES
They move by land and air. They attack with their fists, their poisoned tongues, their fireballs, and their hard heads. They do not rest. They are coming for you.



POWER-UPS
Get amazing power-ups to boost your skills.



FEATURES
Fun!
Frenetic!
Minimalist pixel art, retro style and arcade spirit!
Countless levels!
Many enemies!
Many more traps!
And incredible power-ups for you!
